title: Taipei Cycle Gold Awards by iF for 2021 include products from Merida, Liv, Cadex, & more
content:
The in-person Taipei Cycle show has been officially postponed due to COVID, but that doesn’t mean the award show can’t go on. The annual Taipei Cycle d&i awards seek to highlight the best upcoming products in the bike industry, with the ultimate prize awarded in the form of the gold award by iF. Merida Reacto […]

The post Taipei Cycle Gold Awards by iF for 2021 include products from Merida, Liv, Cadex, & more appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
